verses.text: \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* canticle, \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* dedication \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Davidâ€™s|strong="H1732"\w* house.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w extol|strong="H8034"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* thou hast upheld \w me|strong="H3051"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hast not made \w my|strong="H3068"\w* enemies \w to|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3051"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* cried \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w then|strong="H3068"\w* hast healed \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

Thou hast brought forth, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul \w from|strong="H3068"\w* hell: thou hast saved \w me|strong="H6963"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* go down into \w the|strong="H3068"\w* pit.

Sing \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* ye \w his|strong="H3068"\w* saints: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* give praise \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* memory \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* holiness.

\w For|strong="H1121"\w* wrath \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1121"\w* indignation; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* life \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1121"\w* good \w will|strong="H1121"\w*. \w In|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* evening weeping \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* place, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* morning gladness.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* abundance \w I|strong="H3068"\w* said: \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* never \w be|strong="H3068"\w* moved.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thy favour, thou gavest strength \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* beauty. Thou turnedst \w away|strong="H4057"\w* thy face \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* became troubled.

\w To|strong="H0559"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w cry|strong="H6963"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* make supplication \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

What profit \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* blood, whilst \w I|strong="H3068"\w* go \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* corruption? \w Shall|strong="H3068"\w* dust confess \w to|strong="H3068"\w* thee, \w or|strong="H3068"\w* declare thy truth?

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath heard, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*: \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* became \w my|strong="H5414"\w* helper.
Thou hast turned for me my mourning into joy: thou hast cut my sackcloth, and hast compassed me with gladness:
To the end that my glory may sing to thee, and I may not regret: O Lord my God, I will give praise to thee for ever.
